T02D2516:5a-21: rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang
T02D2516:5a-22: / / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang /
T02D2516:5a-23: rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02D2516:5a-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra bo
T02D2516:5a-25: dhi aa lam ka ra bastra p'u dza me gha
T02D2516:5a-26: sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um
T02D2516:5a-27: / de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings
T02D2516:5a-28: te sems can thams cad kyi tshangs pa chen po'i
T02D2516:5a-29: gnas bzhi thob par gyur cig / ces brjod la
T02D2516:5a-30: / de 'bul te / aom sarba ta th'a ga
T02D2516:5a-31: ta tsa tur ma h'a brahma bi h'a ra p'u
T02D2516:5a-32: dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa
T02D2516:5a-33: / de 'bul te / ma ye h'um / de
T02D2516:5a-34: nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems pa'i las kyi
T02D2516:5a-36: sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran par byas nas /
T02D2516:5a-37: snying rje'i dbang gis sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed de /
T02D2516:5a-38: ma bskal ba rnams bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2516:5a-39: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2516:5a-40: dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2516:5a-41: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs
T02D2516:5a-42: su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dang
T02D2516:5a-43: / sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba'i
T02D2516:5b-0: @5b rgya mtsho las yang dag par bsgral bar bya
T02D2516:5b-1: ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D2516:5b-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra po dhi tsitta
T02D2516:5b-3: p'u da me gha sa mu dra spha ra na
T02D2516:5b-5: sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2516:5b-6: sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyis yang
T02D2516:5b-7: dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
T02D2516:5b-8: 'dod pa tsam la rag lus par gyur cig /
T02D2516:5b-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a badzrod bha
T02D2516:5b-10: ba d'a na p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me
T02D2516:5b-11: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2516:5b-12: h'um / rdo rje phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2516:5b-13: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2516:5b-14: sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang ngag
T02D2516:5b-15: dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang
T02D2516:5b-16: dag par bral bar gyur cig / dge ba bcu'i
T02D2516:5b-17: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams
T02D2516:5b-18: cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /
T02D2516:5b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nutta ra ma h'a
T02D2516:5b-20: bo dhi h'a ra sh'i la p'a ra mi t'a
T02D2516:5b-21: p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha na sa
T02D2516:5b-22: ma ye h'um / rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag
T02D2516:5b-23: rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste
T02D2516:5b-24: ma ye h'um / / sems can thams cad mtshan
T02D2516:5b-25: dang dpe byad thams cad kyis lus la yang dag
T02D2516:5b-26: par brgyan par byas pa dang /
T02D2516:5b-27: rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang /
T02D2516:5b-28: zhe 'gras pa med par zhugs shing ;
T02D2516:5b-29: mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang /
T02D2516:5b-30: chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur
T02D2516:5b-31: cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta
T02D2516:5b-32: ra ma h'a dharma aa ba bo dhi kshanti p'a
T02D2516:5b-33: ra mi ta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra
T02D2516:5b-34: spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2516:5b-35: rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2516:5b-36: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2516:5b-37: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2516:5b-38: sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su gzhol zhing /
T02D2516:5b-39: 'khor ba yongs su mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang
T02D2516:5b-40: ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga
T02D2516:5b-41: ta sa na snga ra aa pa ri tyam k'u
T02D2516:5b-42: nutta ra ma h'a b'irya p'a ra mi ta p'u
T02D2516:5b-43: dza ma gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa
T02D2516:5b-44: ma ye h'um / me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2516:5b-45: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i
T02D2516:5b-46: nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur cig /
T02D2516:5b-47: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /
T02D2516:6a-2: mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
T02D2516:6a-3: rigs pa thams cad dbang du gyur pa phun sum
T02D2516:6a-4: tshogs par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga
T02D2516:6a-5: t'a nutta ra soo ksha bi ha ra dhya na
T02D2516:6a-6: p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu
T02D2516:6a-7: dra sapha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2516:6a-8: bdug spos kyi phyag rgya bcings la ;
T02D2516:6a-9: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2516:6a-10: sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang /
T02D2516:6a-11: ye shes rnams dang yang dag par ldan par gyur
T02D2516:6a-12: cig / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
T02D2516:6a-13: thob ste / bzo dang bstan bcos thams cad shes shing sgyu rtsal dang ldan la /
T02D2516:6a-14: gsang ba'i cho ga shes pa dang /
T02D2516:6a-15: de kho na nyid mthong ste nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2516:6a-16: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2516:6a-17: shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod
T02D2516:6a-18: pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig / aom sarba
T02D2516:6a-19: ta th'a ga t'a nutta ra kle sha tstshe da
T02D2516:6a-20: sarba dharm'a: sa manta dzny'a na ma h'a pradzny'a p'a
T02D2516:6a-21: ra mi ta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra
T02D2516:6a-22: sapha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2516:6a-23: lus kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2516:6a-24: bdag nyid phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus
T02D2516:6a-25: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs drung
T02D2516:6a-26: du phyin par lhag par mos par byas la /
T02D2516:6a-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya ni ry'a
T02D2516:6a-28: ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha
T02D2516:6a-29: ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2516:6a-30: thams cad du lce brgya stong phrag snyed kyi sgo
T02D2516:6a-31: nas mnyam med mi g-yo zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2516:6a-32: pa'i bstod pas mchod par lhag par mos par byas
T02D2516:6a-33: la / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'a ka
T02D2516:6a-34: niry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra
T02D2516:6a-35: spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2516:6a-36: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bsam pa gcig pa'i sbyor bas /
T02D2516:6a-37: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la lhag par mos par byas la /
T02D2516:6a-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta ni ry'a ta
T02D2516:6a-39: na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra
T02D2516:6a-41: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2516:6a-44: smon pa med pa'i rnam par lhag par mos par byas la /
T02D2516:6a-45: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya p'u dza
T02D2516:6a-46: me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma
T02D2516:6a-47: ye h'um / zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2516:6a-48: de ltar mchod pa rnam pa nyi shus de bzhin
T02D2516:6a-49: gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par mchod la
T02D2516:6b-0: / @6b bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste //
T02D2516:6b-1: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid 'bul gyis /
T02D2516:6b-3: rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol /
T02D2516:6b-4: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed
T02D2516:6b-5: rnams kyis dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la
T02D2516:6b-6: stsal du gsol zhes brjod la /
T02D2516:6b-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
T02D2516:6b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis bdag dang sems
T02D2516:6b-9: can thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2516:6b-10: pa'i rgud pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig
T02D2516:6b-11: /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum
T02D2516:6b-12: tshogs pa thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa'i
T02D2516:6b-13: bde ba nyid dang yid bde ba nyid kyis mi'i
T02D2516:6b-14: mchog sangs rgyas su tshe 'di nyid la gyur cig
T02D2516:6b-15: / bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis
T02D2516:6b-16: // 'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog //
T02D2516:6b-17: 'grol phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
T02D2516:6b-18: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las sgrol //
T02D2516:6b-19: zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la /
T02D2516:6b-20: sdom pa gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2516:6b-21: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams ;
T02D2516:6b-22: / byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02D2516:6b-23: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2516:6b-24: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2516:6b-25: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02D2516:6b-26: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02D2516:6b-27: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D2516:6b-28: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D2516:6b-29: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2516:6b-30: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2516:6b-31: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2516:6b-32: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2516:6b-33: nam du yang ni mi spong ngo //
T02D2516:6b-34: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2516:6b-35: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D2516:6b-36: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2516:6b-37: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2516:6b-38: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2516:6b-39: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D2516:6b-40: nyin re bzhin ni dus drug tu //
T02D2516:6b-41: sbyin pa rnams bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D2516:6b-42: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D2516:6b-43: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02D2516:7a-2: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2516:7a-3: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2516:7a-4: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D2516:7a-5: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2516:7a-6: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D2516:7a-7: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2516:7a-8: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas //
T02D2516:7a-9: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2516:7a-10: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02D2516:7a-11: ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi //
T02D2516:7a-12: ma bskal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D2516:7a-13: dbugs ma dbyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D2516:7a-14: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2516:7a-16: de nas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i sbyor bas /
T02D2516:7a-17: phyag rgya bcing ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2516:7a-18: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya ste //
T02D2516:7a-19: thal mo dam du bsdams pa las //
T02D2516:7a-20: sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni //
T02D2516:7a-21: rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te //
T02D2516:7a-22: rab tu bsdam phyir rdo rje bsdams //
T02D2516:7a-23: badzra aanydza li zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so //
T02D2516:7a-24: badzra bandha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste /
T02D2516:7a-25: badzra bandha trat ces brjod cing snying gar lan gsum dral bar bya'o //
T02D2516:7a-27: zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2516:7a-28: aa: zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2516:7a-29: babs pa de yang 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02D2516:7a-30: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba /
T02D2516:7a-31: sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02D2516:7a-33: aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhimme pra ya tstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho //
T02D2516:7a-34: badzra mushti zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2516:7a-35: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2516:7a-38: aom sarba p'a pam a'a karsha na bi sho dha na badzra sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02D2516:7a-39: ces bya ba dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas ngan 'gro thams cad dgug par bya'o //
T02D2516:7a-40: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du //
T02D2516:7a-41: mdzub mo gnyis ni bcings nas su //
T02D2516:7a-42: legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni //
T02D2516:7a-43: ltung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o //
T02D2516:7a-44: aom badzra p'a ni bi spho ta ya /
T02D2516:7a-46: bandha ni pr'a mo ksha ya /
T02D2516:7a-49: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya tra tva /
T02D2516:7a-50: ces brjod cing sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2516:7a-51: sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o //
T02D2516:7a-52: rdo rje bcings pa bsdam byas te //
T02D2516:7a-53: gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas ni //
T02D2516:7b-0: @7b tha ma bzhi yi rtse mo sbyar //
T02D2516:7b-1: sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin //
T02D2516:7b-2: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2516:7b-3: de rnams kyi sngags lan bdun bdun brjod de /
T02D2516:7b-4: 'dis rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2516:7b-5: aom badzra mu: de ltar byas pas phyag rgya thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2516:7b-6: 'di byas pas rnal 'byor pa bskal pa gsum gyis
T02D2516:7b-7: nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dra
T02D2516:7b-8: bar 'gyur ro // de nas rang gi snying gar
T02D2516:7b-9: gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su rang gi lha'i snying
T02D2516:7b-10: po dam tshig gis bris la /
T02D2516:7b-11: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2516:7b-12: de nyid dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa /
T02D2516:7b-13: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur par bsams la /
T02D2516:7b-14: yang de'i steng du de nyid dang /
T02D2516:7b-15: yi ge ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa lta bu yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D2516:7b-16: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i gzugs can gnyis pa nyid du bsam mo //
T02D2516:7b-17: de las byung ba gang yin pa de la ni /
T02D2516:7b-18: yang de'i snying po dang bcas pa las rdo rje
T02D2516:7b-19: rtse lnga pa 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang bcas
T02D2516:7b-20: par bsam mo // gzhan dag gi ni rdo rje las byung ba'i rang gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2516:7b-21: de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i dbus su rang gi snying po bkod la /
T02D2516:7b-22: rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2516:7b-23: ganda& ham zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2516:7b-24: badzro& ham zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D2516:7b-25: rang gi snying po yang bzlas shing //
T02D2516:7b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D2516:7b-27: dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings rang gi phyag rgyal zhugs
T02D2516:7b-28: par bsam mo // de nas badzra dh'a tu zhes
T02D2516:7b-29: zlos shing phyag rgya'i gzugs de sems dpar byin gyis
T02D2516:7b-31: rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la /
T02D2516:7b-32: snyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing /
T02D2516:7b-33: badzra satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2516:7b-34: de nas rang gi sngags kyis rang gi lha'i sku de nyid du bsams la /
T02D2516:7b-36: ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham /
T02D2516:7b-37: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2516:7b-38: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2516:7b-40: de nyid kyis snying ga dang /
T02D2516:8a-2: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam /
T02D2516:8a-3: de nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2516:8a-4: rang rang gi snying po dang /
T02D2516:8a-6: yang rang gi snying ga'i zla bar rdo rje glu'i
T02D2516:8a-7: las kyi phyag rgyas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2516:8a-9: sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod de /
T02D2516:8a-10: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2516:8a-11: de nyid gung mo gnyis kyis phreng ba blang ste /
T02D2516:8a-12: sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02D2516:8a-13: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya zhing /
T02D2516:8a-14: phreng ba de yang pra t'i tstsha badzra ho zhes
T02D2516:8a-15: bya ba 'dis rang gi spyi bor dor bar bya'o
T02D2516:8a-16: // de nas phreng ba de aom pra ti grihna
T02D2516:8a-17: sva mi mam satva ma h'a ba la zhes bya
T02D2516:8a-18: ba 'dis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2516:8a-19: de nas aom badzra satva sa yan te ha tsa ksh'u da gha ta tang par /
T02D2516:8a-20: aung gha ta ya ti sarba aaksho /
T02D2516:8a-21: badzra tsakshur nutta ra he badzra p'a shya zhes bya ba 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2516:8a-22: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02D2516:8a-23: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du /
T02D2516:8a-24: rang gi lus la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o //
T02D2516:8a-25: yang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2516:8a-26: tishtha badzra zhes zlos zhing snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2516:8a-27: de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /

T02D2516:12a-9: zhes bya ba thams cad ni /
T02D2516:12a-10: chos kyi phyag rgya yin te /
T02D2516:12a-11: snga ma bzhin du lce la rdo rje bsams la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2516:12a-12: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste /
T02D2516:12a-13: rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te /
T02D2516:12a-14: mnyam par gzhag pa gnyis su bya //
T02D2516:12a-15: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02D2516:12a-16: de nas bcings pa rab tu bshad //
T02D2516:12a-17: g-yon pa rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02D2516:12a-18: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02D2516:12a-19: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
T02D2516:12a-20: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
T02D2516:12a-21: mi g-yo ba yi sa reg pa //
T02D2516:12a-22: rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D2516:12a-23: tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog / gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02D2516:12a-24: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2516:12a-25: mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya //
T02D2516:12a-26: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2516:12a-27: rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste //
T02D2516:12a-28: bsgyings bcas bsor ba gnyis ka yis //
T02D2516:12a-29: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang //
T02D2516:12a-30: mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni //
T02D2516:12a-31: legs so zhes pa snying gar gzhag //
T02D2516:12a-32: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis//
T02D2516:12a-33: snying gar nyi ma brtan par bya //
T02D2516:12a-34: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
T02D2516:12a-35: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
T02D2516:12a-36: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon par dbye //
T02D2516:12a-37: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri mdung //
T02D2516:12a-38: mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02D2516:12a-39: rdo rje snying ga kha nas dbyung //
T02D2516:12a-40: rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yis //
T02D2516:12a-41: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag //
T02D2516:12a-42: go cha mthe'u chung phye ba dang //
T02D2516:12a-43: khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o //
T02D2516:12a-44: rdo rje bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02D2516:12a-45: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02D2516:12a-46: phreng ba bcings dang kha nas dbyung //
T02D2516:12a-47: rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yis ;
T02D2516:12a-48: / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ni //
T02D2516:12a-49: gdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin //
T02D2516:12a-50: sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi //
T02D2516:12a-51: phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa'o //
T02D2516:12a-52: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa ni //
T02D2516:12a-53: mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02D2516:12a-54: mkhrig ma mdud la mdzub gnyis mdud //
T02D2516:12b-0: rgyab @12b gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02D2516:12b-1: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba 'byung ste /
T02D2516:12b-2: ji skad du bshad pa'i byang chub mchog ni /
T02D2516:12b-5: lag pa g-yas pa sa la reg pa'i tshul du byas pa ni /
T02D2516:12b-7: de nyid kyi lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bya ba ni /
T02D2516:12b-9: ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya ni /
T02D2516:12b-11: de nyid las lag pa g-yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni /
T02D2516:12b-13: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dril bu dang bcas pa bsnyen pa'i tshul du dkur brten la /
T02D2516:12b-14: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje bsor te /
T02D2516:12b-15: rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa ni /
T02D2516:12b-17: rdo rje lcags kyu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2516:12b-18: dgug pa'i tshul du gnas pa ni rdo rje rgyal
T02D2516:12b-19: po'i'o // rdo rje mdas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bigs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni /
T02D2516:12b-21: rdo rje khu tshur dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis
T02D2516:12b-22: legs so zhes pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2516:12b-23: thams cad mnyes par byed pa ni /
T02D2516:12b-25: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rin po che rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing /
T02D2516:12b-26: g-yon pa'i dril bu dang bcas pa dkur brten pa ni rdo rje snying po'i'o //
T02D2516:12b-27: rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis de
T02D2516:12b-28: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar byed pa ni
T02D2516:12b-30: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan gyis sbyin pa'i
T02D2516:12b-31: pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par sbyor bar
T02D2516:12b-32: byed pa ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi'o //
T02D2516:12b-33: rdo rje 'dzum pas rab tu dga' bar byed pa ni /
T02D2516:12b-35: g-yon pa bsnyems pa dang bcas pas padma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing /
T02D2516:12b-36: phyag g-yas pas rang gi snying gar padma 'byed pa ni rdo rje can gyi'o //
T02D2516:12b-37: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis thugs kar shes
T02D2516:12b-38: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams
T02D2516:12b-39: shing / phyag g-yas pas rdo rje ral gri bsnams te /
T02D2516:12b-40: 'debs pa'i tshul du 'jog pa ni rdo rje blo'i'o //
T02D2516:13a-1: la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bskor ba'i tshul du 'jog pa ni /
T02D2516:13a-3: rdo rje ljags kyis smra ba'i tshul du mdzad pa ni /
T02D2516:13a-5: g-yon pa dkur brten pas sna tshogs rdo rje dang
T02D2516:13a-6: bcas pa'i dril bu bsnams shing phyag g-yas pas sna
T02D2516:13a-7: tshogs rdo rje thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin
T02D2516:13a-8: pa ni / rdo rje sna tshogs kyi'o //
T02D2516:13a-9: rdo rje go cha 'dzin pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i'o //
T02D2516:13a-10: rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha rang gi zhal du bzhag pas bsdigs pa'i tshul du mdzad pa ni /
T02D2516:13a-12: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i
T02D2516:13a-13: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dam tshig gi rdo rje
T02D2516:13a-14: khu tshur gyis btsir ba ni /
T02D2516:13a-16: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa rdo rje sgeg mo'i'o //
T02D2516:13a-17: rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ni phreng ba ma'i'o //
T02D2516:13a-18: pi wang brdebs [?] pa ltar byed pa ni pi wang ma'i'o //
T02D2516:13a-19: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams te gar mdzad pa ni gar mkhan ma'i'o //
T02D2516:13a-20: phyag na spos snod bsnams pa ni bdug pa ma'i'o //
T02D2516:13a-21: phyag na me tog gi za ma tog bsnams pa ni me tog ma'i'o //
T02D2516:13a-22: phyag na mar me'i sdod bu bsnams pa ni mar me ma'i'o //
T02D2516:13a-23: phyag na dri'i dung phor bsnams pa ni byug pa ma'i'o //
T02D2516:13a-24: phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /
T02D2516:13a-27: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D2516:13a-28: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas dngos grub thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2516:13a-29: phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba thams cad la yang
T02D2516:13a-30: rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgom par
T02D2516:13a-31: bya'o // bdag nyid chen po gang gang gi //
T02D2516:13a-32: phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa //
T02D2516:13a-33: bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni //
T02D2516:13a-34: der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
T02D2516:13a-35: dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad la ;
T02D2516:13a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la ni sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2516:13a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcings pa la ni /
T02D2516:13a-38: su ra ta stvam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2516:13a-39: de'i rjes la yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas pas brtan par byas nas /
T02D2516:13b-0: dbang @13b bskur ba thams cad dang /
T02D2516:13b-1: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang de bzhin du blangs la /
T02D2516:13b-2: badzra satva su sam gra h'a ta /
T02D2516:13b-5: badzra karma ka rod bha be /
T02D2516:13b-6: zhes bya ba rdo rje glur blangs shing /
T02D2516:13b-7: re re zhing rdo rje'i gar byas la /
T02D2516:13b-8: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod pa brgyad
T02D2516:13b-9: kyis las kyi phyag rgyas yang dag par mchod de
T02D2516:13b-10: / lag pa g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu blangs la /
T02D2516:13b-11: g-yas pas rdo rje bsor zhing /
T02D2516:13b-12: rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02D2516:13b-13: takki h'um dza:yang rdo rje rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'jog cing /
T02D2516:13b-14: takki dza ho zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2516:13b-15: de ltar byas pas ni lus dang dag dang sems rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2516:13b-16: yi ge h'um gi rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpar bsams la /
T02D2516:13b-17: de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2516:13b-18: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2516:13b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2516:13b-20: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2516:13b-21: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / bcom ldan
T02D2516:13b-22: 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o zhes bya ba
T02D2516:13b-23: ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D2516:13b-24: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya ste /
T02D2516:13b-25: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i bdag
T02D2516:13b-26: po dam pa kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug gi
T02D2516:13b-27: dam pa de nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang
T02D2516:13b-28: dag par stsol bar mdzad pa ni /
T02D2516:13b-29: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D2516:13b-30: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog //
T02D2516:13b-31: srid pa'i mchog ni grub par byed //
T02D2516:13b-32: dharm'a aa zhes bya ba ni //
T02D2516:13b-34: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2516:13b-35: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung /
T02D2516:13b-36: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02D2516:13b-37: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D2516:13b-38: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
T02D2516:13b-39: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02D2516:13b-40: ci 'dod par ni brten bzhin du //
T02D2516:13b-41: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2516:13b-42: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D2516:13b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med
T02D2516:13b-44: pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i dam
T02D2516:14a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2516:14a-5: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
T02D2516:14a-6: phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
T02D2516:14a-7: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan phyir ro //
T02D2516:14a-8: de nas dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2516:14a-9: aom nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02D2516:14a-10: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog //
T02D2516:14a-11: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02D2516:14a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod //
T02D2516:14a-13: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02D2516:14a-14: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02D2516:14a-15: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2516:14a-16: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2516:14a-17: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod //
T02D2516:14a-18: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
T02D2516:14a-19: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02D2516:14a-20: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02D2516:14a-21: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog //
T02D2516:14a-22: gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2516:14a-23: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2516:14a-24: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2516:14a-25: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po rgya mchog gis //
T02D2516:14a-26: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod la /
T02D2516:14a-27: rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig //
T02D2516:14a-28: de ltar bdag nyid rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D2516:14a-29: phyag rgya chen pos nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas la /
T02D2516:14a-30: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D2516:14a-31: a'a dya nu tpanna tv'a ta ces brjod la de'i
T02D2516:14a-32: don la lhag par mos pas 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2516:14a-33: mtha' dag stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2516:14a-34: de nas yi ge h'um las byung pa'i rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
T02D2516:14a-35: rgya mtsho chen po'i bar du bsams la /
T02D2516:14a-36: de'i dbus su h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las /
T02D2516:14a-37: ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can zur bzhi pa /
T02D2516:14a-38: rin po che thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bskyed la /
T02D2516:14a-39: aom badzra dri dho zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2516:14a-40: rdo rje bsdams pas snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2516:14a-41: de'i steng du rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas khang pa brtsegs pa /
T02D2516:14a-42: rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa sprul la /
T02D2516:14a-43: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su aa sim aa zhes bya bas seng ge'i gdan /
T02D2516:14b-0: @14b mi bskyod pa'i gnas su h'um gam h'um zhes bya bas glang po che'i gdan /
T02D2516:14b-1: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su tra p'a tra zhes bya bas rta'i gdan /
T02D2516:14b-2: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su /
T02D2516:14b-3: hr'i: mam hr'i:zhes bya bas rma bya'i gdan /
T02D2516:14b-4: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su /
T02D2516:14b-5: aa gam aa zhes bya ba las nam mkha' lding gi gdan bsam par bya'o //
T02D2516:14b-6: seng ge'i gdan la sogs pa la yang yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
T02D2516:14b-7: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02D2516:14b-8: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
T02D2516:14b-9: mngon du byas pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus
T02D2516:14b-10: kyis / 'og min du bskal pa grangs med pa
T02D2516:14b-11: gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2516:14b-12: sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs
T02D2516:14b-13: su bdag nyid bskyed par bsams la /
T02D2516:14b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2516:14b-15: zhing 'di thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin du
T02D2516:14b-16: yongs su gang bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D2516:14b-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku nyid dang chos nyid dran par bya'o //
T02D2516:14b-18: de nas theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i chos so //
T02D2516:14b-19: de'i rjes la theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran par bya'o //
T02D2516:14b-20: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad dang /
T02D2516:14b-21: 'gro ba thams cad la lhag par byams pa bskyed par bya ba dang /
T02D2516:14b-22: ngan 'gro la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba thams cad la snying rje ba dang /
T02D2516:14b-23: 'phags pa thams cad la dga' ba dang /
T02D2516:14b-24: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la btang snyoms su bya ba dang /
T02D2516:14b-25: chos thams cad la yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2516:14b-26: sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid dang /
T02D2516:14b-27: mig yor dang mtshungs pa nyid du lhag par mos par byas la ;
T02D2516:14b-28: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2516:14b-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2516:14b-30: thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang /
T02D2516:14b-31: rigs lnga dang rdo rje dril bu dang /
T02D2516:14b-32: phyag rgya dang slob dpon nyid dang /
T02D2516:15a-2: sngags kyi tshul thams cad ston pa dang /
T02D2516:15a-3: theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba dang /
T02D2516:15a-4: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa rnams mngon du byas la /
T02D2516:15a-5: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T02D2516:15a-6: bde ba bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2516:15a-7: sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bsams nas /
T02D2516:15a-8: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2516:15a-9: de nas rim pa 'dis mngon par byang chub pa sngon du bya'o //
T02D2516:15a-11: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la //
T02D2516:15a-12: de'i steng du rdo rje bsdams pa bkang te bzhag la /
T02D2516:15a-13: rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam par bsams nas /
T02D2516:15a-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs
T02D2516:15a-16: rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dper na til gyi gang bu
T02D2516:15a-17: bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to //
T02D2516:15a-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te /
T02D2516:15a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2516:15a-20: byang chub kyi snying por 'dug pa gang na bder gshegs te /
T02D2516:15a-21: byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas /
T02D2516:15a-23: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin
T02D2516:15a-24: gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon
T02D2516:15a-26: dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed
T02D2516:15a-27: cing ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par
T02D2516:15a-28: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D2516:15a-29: par bya snyam / de nas byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2516:15a-30: sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de
T02D2516:15a-31: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas /
T02D2516:15a-32: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
T02D2516:15a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas /

T02D2516:18b-28: ma rungs par ni ston par 'gyur //
T02D2516:18b-29: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:18b-30: ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog //
T02D2516:18b-31: kun gyi mchog ni 'dul byed pa //
T02D2516:18b-32: rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rno ste //
T02D2516:18b-33: thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2516:18b-34: ae ma'o rab tu brtan bcings pa'i //
T02D2516:18b-35: dam tshig bdag ste bstan pa dag //
T02D2516:18b-36: bsam pa thams cad rab 'grub phyir //
T02D2516:18b-37: grol ba rnams kyang bcing bar byed //
T02D2516:18b-38: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:18b-39: phyag rgya bcing ba che zhing brtan //
T02D2516:18b-40: sangs rgyas kun du myur 'grub phyir //
T02D2516:18b-41: dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka' //
T02D2516:18b-42: de nas mi bskyod pa'i nga rgyal gyis rdo rje sems ma bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2516:18b-43: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal gyis rin chen sems ma bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2516:18b-44: 'od dpag tu med pa'i nga rgyal gyis chos kyi sems ma bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2516:19a-0: don yod par grub pa'i nga rgyal gyis @19a * //
T02D2516:19a-1: las kyi sems ma bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2516:19a-2: 'di rnams kyi ched du brjod pa ni //
T02D2516:19a-4: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:19a-5: sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa'i bdag //
T02D2516:19a-6: gang phyir brtan pas lus med kyang //
T02D2516:19a-7: rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin //
T02D2516:19a-8: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:19a-9: rdo rje rin chen bdag nyid grags //
T02D2516:19a-10: gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:19a-11: dbang gi tshul ni brtan po yin //
T02D2516:19a-12: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:19a-13: chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma bdag //
T02D2516:19a-14: gang phyir rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
T02D2516:19a-15: 'dod chags yin yang dri ma med//
T02D2516:19a-16: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:19a-17: las kyi rdo rje mang po bdag //
T02D2516:19a-18: gang phyir gcig kyang sems can khams //
T02D2516:19a-19: ma lus par ni las zad byed //
T02D2516:19a-20: yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis /
T02D2516:19a-21: sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi bskyed de /
T02D2516:19a-22: 'di rnams kyi ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2516:19a-23: ae ma'o rang byung rnams kyi ni //
T02D2516:19a-24: mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de //
T02D2516:19a-25: gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas //
T02D2516:19a-26: mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur //
T02D2516:19a-27: ae ma'o rin chen mchod pa bzhes //
T02D2516:19a-28: bdag dang 'dra ba grags pa med //
T02D2516:19a-29: gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchog kyang ;
T02D2516:19a-30: / rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur //
T02D2516:19a-31: ae ma'o bdag ni kun gzigs pa'i //
T02D2516:19a-32: glu mchog tshul gyi mchod pa yin //
T02D2516:19a-33: gang phyir sgra brnyan 'dra ba yi //
T02D2516:19a-34: mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed //
T02D2516:19a-35: ae ma'o mchog kun don mdzad pa'i //
T02D2516:19a-36: mchod pa rgya cher bdag yin te /
T02D2516:19a-37: gang phyir rdo rje gar cho gas //
T02D2516:19a-38: sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed //
T02D2516:19a-39: yang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i nga rgyas kyis /
T02D2516:19a-40: rdo rje bdug pa mo la sogs pa bzhi bskyed de /
T02D2516:19a-41: 'di rnams kyi ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2516:19a-42: ae ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che //
T02D2516:19a-43: rab tu tshim ldan dge ba yin //
T02D2516:19a-44: gang phyir sems can dbang ldan pas //
T02D2516:19a-45: myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2516:19a-46: ae ma'o me tog mchod pa'i bdag //
T02D2516:19a-47: thams cad kyis ni rgyan byed de //
T02D2516:19a-48: gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2516:19a-49: rin chen nyid du myur du 'grub //
T02D2516:19a-50: ae ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni //
T02D2516:19b-0: rgya chen dge @19b ba bdag yin te //
T02D2516:19b-1: gang phyir gnas bcas myur du ni //
T02D2516:19b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang thob //
T02D2516:19b-3: ae ma'o dri yi rang bzhin gyi //
T02D2516:19b-4: mchod pa'i lha rdzas yid 'ong ba //
T02D2516:19b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dri //
T02D2516:19b-7: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis /
T02D2516:19b-8: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi bskyed de /
T02D2516:19b-9: 'di rnams kyi ched du brjod pa ni /
T02D2516:19b-10: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:19b-11: yang dag spyan 'dren brtan pa'i bdag / gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pas //
T02D2516:19b-13: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:19b-14: rdo rje zhags pa dam po'i bdag / rdul phran zhugs pa thams cad kyang //
T02D2516:19b-15: bdag gis slar yang drang bar bya //
T02D2516:19b-16: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:19b-17: rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po'i bdag / bcings pa kun las grol ba rnams //
T02D2516:19b-18: sems can don kun bcing bar 'dod //
T02D2516:19b-19: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:19b-20: rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa'i bdag / kun gyi bdag tu gyur nas kyang //
T02D2516:19b-21: bran du yang ni gyur pa yin //
T02D2516:19b-23: 'di tsan gyis dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin brtan pa yin no /
T02D2516:19b-26: // / de nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad dang tha mi dad par bsams la bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2516:19b-27: de nas bsdu bas byin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2516:19b-28: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams
T02D2516:19b-29: cad / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'a da bandha nam ka ro mi zhes brjod cing /
T02D2516:19b-30: ae ma'o kun du bzang pho yi ;
T02D2516:19b-31: / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi //
T02D2516:19b-32: dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes //
T02D2516:19b-33: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2516:19b-34: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs te slar byung nas /
T02D2516:19b-35: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa dang gcig tu gyur te /
T02D2516:19b-36: yang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad de /
T02D2516:19b-37: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2516:19b-38: rgya chen gdong nas skye ba med //
T02D2516:19b-39: rdul phran thams cad ji snyed kyi //
T02D2516:19b-40: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur //
T02D2516:20a-0: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i @20a * //
T02D2516:20a-1: gnas na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2516:20a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa blangs nas /
T02D2516:20a-3: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-7: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas /
T02D2516:20a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-9: rigs thams cad la rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-10: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang /
T02D2516:20a-12: rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang ;
T02D2516:20a-15: 'od kyis snang bar bya ba dang /
T02D2516:20a-16: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par sbyor ba dang /
T02D2516:20a-17: 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la nges par sbyor ba dang /
T02D2516:20a-18: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02D2516:20a-19: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gcod pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-21: spros pa med pa'i chos la nges par sbyor ba dang /
T02D2516:20a-22: mchod pa ma lus shing lus pa med pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-23: theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-24: sems can nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa rnams las bsrung ba dang /
T02D2516:20a-25: srung ba thams cad las yongs su bskyab pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-26: sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig tu byas pa nyid kyi bcing ba nyid kyi khu tshur dang /
T02D2516:20a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-35: thabs rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02D2516:20a-36: rdo rje lcags kyus sems can thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-37: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyod pa la gzhug pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-38: theg pa gzhan 'dod pa la sems dran ba dang /
T02D2516:20a-39: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing skye ba med par dbab pa dang /
T02D2516:20a-40: dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer bskyang ba nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2516:20a-41: 'di ni las kyi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no /
T02D2516:20b-0: // / de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin @20b yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus /
T02D2516:20b-1: mchod pa'i yan lag rnams bsangs la /
T02D2516:20b-2: rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas yongs su bzlas la /
T02D2516:20b-3: badzra pushpe h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2516:20b-4: me tog gi phyag rgyas me tog / badzra gandhe h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2516:20b-6: badzra dh'u pe h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2516:20b-7: bdug pa'i phyag rgyas bdug pa dang /
T02D2516:20b-8: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D2516:20b-9: a'adya nutpa nna tv'a ta ces bya ba dang /
T02D2516:20b-10: ral gri'i phyag rgyas ni bshos te /
T02D2516:20b-11: rdo rje bsdams pa las ral gris 'debs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2516:20b-12: badzra a'a lo ke zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2516:20b-13: mar me'i phyag rgya ni mar me'o ;
T02D2516:20b-14: / aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2516:20b-19: me tog dkar po dri zhim pa dang /
T02D2516:20b-20: tsandan dkar po'i chu dung la sogs pa'i snod du blugs la /
T02D2516:20b-21: rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2516:20b-22: gyis mchod yon gyi phyag rgya dang lan gsum mam
T02D2516:20b-23: bdun nam / nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2516:20b-24: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du sgo dbye ba byas la /
T02D2516:20b-25: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2516:20b-26: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bzlas la /
T02D2516:20b-27: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bdag nyid /
T02D2516:20b-28: lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rje btsir //
T02D2516:20b-29: rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis //
T02D2516:20b-30: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02D2516:20b-31: g-yon pa'i se gol brdabs pa dang //
T02D2516:20b-32: g-yas pa yis ni grub par 'gyur //
T02D2516:20b-33: g-yas pa thal mo zhes bya ste //
T02D2516:20b-34: 'dus pa yang ni gnyi ga yin //
T02D2516:20b-35: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2516:20b-37: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po'o //
T02D2516:20b-38: 'di ni bka' tsam gyis bsgrags pas /
T02D2516:20b-40: sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur na //
T02D2516:20b-41: gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos //
T02D2516:20b-42: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi ;
T02D2516:20b-43: / phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02D2516:20b-44: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02D2516:20b-45: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi //
T02D2516:20b-46: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02D2516:20b-47: lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas //
T02D2516:20b-48: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02D2516:20b-49: dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi //
T02D2516:21a-1: tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2516:21a-2: sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02D2516:21a-3: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02D2516:21a-4: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes byar brjod /
T02D2516:21a-6: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa dang /
T02D2516:21a-8: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo yang bcad de /
T02D2516:21a-9: rdo rje sems dpas mchod yon phul la /
T02D2516:21a-10: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2516:21a-11: badzra dh'a tu dri shya zhes bya ba la sogs pas thams cad blta bar byas la /
T02D2516:21a-12: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho aa ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2516:21a-13: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i snying po dang /
T02D2516:21a-14: sngags lan gsum brjod la chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang /
T02D2516:21a-15: de rnams la rgyas btab ste /
T02D2516:21a-16: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pas dbang bskur la /
T02D2516:21a-17: mchod yon phul nas mchod par bya ste /
T02D2516:21a-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpa p'u dza me
T02D2516:21a-19: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2516:21a-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandha p'u dza me
T02D2516:21a-23: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2516:21a-24: h'um zhes bya ba dang dris so //
T02D2516:21a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pa p'u dza
T02D2516:21a-26: me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma
T02D2516:21a-27: ye h'um zhes bya ba dang bdug pas so //
T02D2516:21a-28: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a
T02D2516:21a-29: dya nu tpanna tv'a ta ces bya ba dang bshos
T02D2516:21a-30: kyis so // aom sarba ta th'a ga ta d'i
T02D2516:21a-31: pa p'u dza me gha se mu dra spha ra
T02D2516:21a-32: na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang mar
T02D2516:21a-34: sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2516:21a-35: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'atma nam ni r+ya
T02D2516:21a-36: ta na p'u dza spha ra na karma badzri h'um
T02D2516:21a-37: aa: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sarba a'atma nam
T02D2516:21a-38: ni r+y'a ta na p'u dza sphar na karma gri
T02D2516:21a-39: dza: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sarba a'atma nam
T02D2516:21a-40: ni r+y'a ta na aa nu r'a ga na p'u
T02D2516:21a-41: ja spha ra na karma b'a ne h'um ho: aom
T02D2516:21a-42: sarba ta th'a ga ta a'atma nam ni r+y'a ta
T02D2516:21a-43: na s'a dhu ka ra p'u dza spha ra na
T02D2516:21a-44: karma tushti aa: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga
T02D2516:21a-45: ta k'a ya aam bhishe ke ratne bhyo badzra ma
T02D2516:21a-46: ni aom / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta s'u
T02D2516:21a-47: r+ye bhyo badzra te dza ni dzv'a la hr'i: aom
T02D2516:21a-48: nam: sarba ta th'a th'a ga ta a'a sha pa
T02D2516:21a-49: ri p'u ra na tsihna ma ni dhva dz'a gre
T02D2516:21a-50: bhyo badzra dhva dza gre tr'am /
T02D2516:21a-51: aom nam: sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a pr'i
T02D2516:21a-52: ti pra mo dya k'a re bhyo badzra h'a sya
T02D2516:21b-0: h'a: aom @21b sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu
T02D2516:21b-1: ga ta badzra dharma ta sa m'a ti bhi stu
T02D2516:21b-2: no mi ma h'a dharma gri hr'i: aom sarba ta
T02D2516:21b-3: th'a ga ta pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a nir
T02D2516:21b-4: ha ree tu no mi ma h'a gho sha nu
T02D2516:21b-5: ge dham / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsakra
T02D2516:21b-6: aaksha pa ri b'a ra ta di sarba s'u tr'an
T02D2516:21b-7: tra na yee stu no mi sarba mandale h'um /
T02D2516:21b-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sandha bh'a sha buddha
T02D2516:21b-9: sam g'i ti pi rge yam stu no mi badzra
T02D2516:21b-10: b'a rtse b'am / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D2516:21b-11: dh'u pa p'u dza me gha sa spha ra na
T02D2516:21b-12: p'u dza karme ka ra ka ra /
T02D2516:21b-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu shpa pra sar
T02D2516:21b-14: spha ra na p'u dza karme ki ri ki ri
T02D2516:21b-15: / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ka
T02D2516:21b-16: dzva la spha ra na p'u dza ka rme ka
T02D2516:21b-17: / ra ka ra / aom sarba ta th'a ga
T02D2516:21b-18: ta gandha sa mu dra spha ra na p'u dza
T02D2516:21b-19: karme ku ru ku ru zhes bya bas sems dpa'
T02D2516:21b-20: bcu drug dang 'dra ba'i rig ma las kyi phyag
T02D2516:21b-21: rgya dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D2516:21b-22: de'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin te /
T02D2516:21b-23: rdo rje bsdams pa dkur bzhag ste //
T02D2516:21b-24: btsir ba gnyis su byas pa yis //
T02D2516:21b-25: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ni //
T02D2516:21b-26: bsgyings bcas bsor ba gnyis ka yis //
T02D2516:21b-27: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang /
T02D2516:21b-28: mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni //
T02D2516:21b-29: legs so zhes pa snying gar bzhag / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis //
T02D2516:21b-30: snying gar nyi ma bstan par bya //
T02D2516:21b-31: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
T02D2516:21b-32: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
T02D2516:21b-33: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon par dbye //
T02D2516:21b-34: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri 'dud //
T02D2516:21b-35: mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02D2516:21b-36: rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung //
T02D2516:21b-37: rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yi //
T02D2516:21b-38: thal mo 'grom [?] pa spyi bor gzhag / go cha mthe'u chung phye ba dang ;
T02D2516:21b-39: / khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o //

T02D2516:25a-23: chog bzhin du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2516:25a-24: nyin zhag gnyis pa la thun gsum du yang dag par bzlas par bya zhing /
T02D2516:25a-27: 'og nas bshad pa'i de'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid chen pos shes par byas la /
T02D2516:25a-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2516:25a-29: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2516:25a-31: sangs rgyas spyan la re re zhing mar la sogs pa'i sreg blugs dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2516:25a-32: lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o /
T02D2516:25a-34: // / de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la /
T02D2516:25a-36: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02D2516:25a-37: me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod la /
T02D2516:25a-38: phyag byas nas slob ma lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2516:25a-39: de la re zhig dang por khrus legs par bya'o //
T02D2516:25b-0: @25b lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la /
T02D2516:25b-2: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D2516:25b-3: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2516:25b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2516:25b-5: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2516:25b-6: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02D2516:25b-7: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D2516:25b-8: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2516:25b-9: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2516:25b-10: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D2516:25b-12: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste /
T02D2516:25b-13: rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni //
T02D2516:25b-14: shin tu bsam pa bzang por ldan pas nyon //
T02D2516:25b-15: brjod ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
T02D2516:25b-16: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02D2516:25b-17: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02D2516:25b-18: rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //
T02D2516:25b-19: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
T02D2516:25b-20: spyan sngar ma lus da ltar so sor bshags //
T02D2516:25b-21: bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang //
T02D2516:25b-22: rgya ches 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don //
T02D2516:25b-23: sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la yang /
T02D2516:25b-24: rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D2516:25b-25: thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing //
T02D2516:25b-26: blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom //
T02D2516:25b-27: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang zhugs pa //
T02D2516:25b-28: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2516:25b-29: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste //
T02D2516:25b-30: dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi rgyal byed tshal //
T02D2516:25b-31: srid pa'i 'byor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2516:25b-32: 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing //
T02D2516:25b-33: blo gros rnams rgyal thugs rje cher ldan pa'i //
T02D2516:25b-34: brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs mchi zhing //
T02D2516:25b-35: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2516:25b-36: rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //
T02D2516:25b-37: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal gyur pa //
T02D2516:25b-38: snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs //
T02D2516:25b-39: mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2516:26a-1: rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am //
T02D2516:26a-2: yang na yongs su bskyab par bya phyir ram //
T02D2516:26a-3: rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2516:26a-4: 'di dag thams cad rtsva sogs bzhin du btang //
T02D2516:26a-5: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02D2516:26a-6: bsam gtan shes rab bla na med pa ni //
T02D2516:26a-7: bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2516:26a-8: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi //
T02D2516:26a-9: bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yis //
T02D2516:26a-10: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
T02D2516:26a-11: 'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2516:26a-12: khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi //
T02D2516:26a-14: bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
T02D2516:26a-15: bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
T02D2516:26a-16: bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o ;
T02D2516:26a-17: / bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang /
T02D2516:26a-18: thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas /
T02D2516:26a-19: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gzhag par bgyi'o //
T02D2516:26a-20: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang /
T02D2516:26a-21: sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D2516:26a-22: bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02D2516:26a-23: bdag gis ma yengs pa'i sems dang /
T02D2516:26a-24: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o //
T02D2516:26a-25: bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02D2516:26a-26: bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
T02D2516:26a-27: rtsa bdun la gnas par so sor rtogs par bya
T02D2516:26a-29: bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2516:26a-30: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T02D2516:26a-31: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor
T02D2516:26a-32: rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o
T02D2516:26a-33: // de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos
T02D2516:26b-0: tshad med pa ma lus pa'i @26b bar la mngon
T02D2516:26b-1: par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par
T02D2516:26b-2: // bgyi'o // 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2516:26b-3: chen po rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed
T02D2516:26b-4: par rdo rje lta bu yin te /
T02D2516:26b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang /
T02D2516:26b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang /
T02D2516:26b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu
T02D2516:26b-8: bo ste 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun du
T02D2516:26b-9: bzang po'o // de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis
T02D2516:26b-10: ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par
T02D2516:26b-11: byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la
T02D2516:26b-12: gnas pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya
T02D2516:26b-13: ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa mtha' med
T02D2516:26b-14: par gyur pa rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D2516:26b-15: gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la
T02D2516:26b-16: spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan
T02D2516:26b-17: pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang /
T02D2516:26b-18: yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang /
T02D2516:26b-19: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o //
T02D2516:26b-20: de nas sa ma ya aa zhes bzlas pas slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02D2516:26b-21: de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa de bzhag la /
T02D2516:26b-22: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam aa ho //
T02D2516:26b-23: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham zhes bya ba'i snying po yang snying gar bzlas la /
T02D2516:26b-24: spyi bor spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa bzhag ste /
T02D2516:26b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing /
T02D2516:26b-27: dpral bar yi ge tram las rin po che /
T02D2516:26b-28: lkog mar yi ge hram las padma /
T02D2516:26b-29: spyi bor kam las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2516:26b-33: rang gi snying ga la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2516:26b-34: de nas rdo rje dris de rnams kyi lag par dri sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2516:26b-35: me tog gis me tog go //
T02D2516:26b-36: bdug pas bdug spos dbul lo //
T02D2516:26b-37: mar mes mar me'i snang ba bya'o //
T02D2516:26b-38: de nas au dumw'a ra dang aa shvadtha la sogs
T02D2516:26b-39: pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mor me
T02D2516:26b-40: tog bcings pa / rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2516:26b-41: des kyang shar ram byang du bltas te rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya'o //
T02D2516:26b-42: de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po dang /
T02D2516:26b-43: rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su bzlas pa byin nas /
T02D2516:27a-1: 'dis ni sngags su gyis la nyol cig ces bsgo'o //
T02D2516:27a-2: de nas dpung pa g-yon par ni //
T02D2516:27a-3: rdo rje srung ba bzlas pa yi //
T02D2516:27a-4: srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i //
T02D2516:27a-5: bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bcing //
T02D2516:27a-6: de nas zab cing rgya che ba'i chos ci nus par bstan pas /
T02D2516:27a-7: thams cad la gzengs bstod pa byas nas /
T02D2516:27a-8: bzhin bzangs dag longs shig / nang par dkyil 'khor
T02D2516:27a-9: chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba lhag
T02D2516:27a-12: // / de nas nyi ma shar kar dkyil 'khor de
T02D2516:27a-13: de bzhin du steng du nam mkha' la bzhag la
T02D2516:27a-15: de la dang por re zhig chon rtsi sngon po dang /
T02D2516:27a-19: dkar po dri zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so sor bsgyur la /
T02D2516:27a-20: go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag nas /
T02D2516:27a-21: de la h'um dr'am hr'i: aa aom zhes bya bas
T02D2516:27a-22: rang rang gi sa bon las mi bskyod pa la
T02D2516:27a-23: sogs pa srad bu la bkod de /
T02D2516:27a-24: d'i pta drishti aam ku sha dza: zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la //
T02D2516:27a-25: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig //
T02D2516:27a-26: mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02D2516:27a-27: zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas /
T02D2516:27a-28: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la bskul zhing /
T02D2516:27a-29: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2516:27a-30: rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig / ces bya bas kyang bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2516:27a-31: de nas rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul
T02D2516:27a-32: ba'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pas btab pa'i srad
T02D2516:27a-33: bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste /
T02D2516:27a-34: rang gi lag na gnas pa la //
T02D2516:27a-35: srad bu des gang bar byas la /
T02D2516:27a-36: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a: spa
T02D2516:27a-37: ra spa ra aa nu pra bishti sarba dharm'a: aa
T02D2516:27a-38: tyan ta / aa nu pra bishta /
T02D2516:27a-39: sarba dharm'a: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shir bsgril bar bya'o //
T02D2516:27a-40: bsgril nas mig g-yas dang g-yon gnyis su ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02D2516:27a-41: badzra drishta ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas la /
T02D2516:27a-42: srad bu de dris byugs ba'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du legs par bzhag la /
T02D2516:27a-43: dri dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas mchod la /
T02D2516:27b-0: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a @27b ti
T02D2516:27b-1: kra ma h'um zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams pas
T02D2516:27b-2: bzung ste / lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2516:27b-3: de nas sems dpa' bcu drug bzlas pa'i dris /
T02D2516:27b-4: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yang byugs la /
T02D2516:27b-5: phyi rol kun du me tog gis mdzes par byas nas /
T02D2516:27b-6: bar snang la bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod yon phul te /
T02D2516:27b-7: me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2516:27b-8: sgeg mo la sogs pas thams cad mchod la /
T02D2516:27b-10: mig g-yas dang g-yon du yi ge dza ser po bkod la /
T02D2516:27b-11: nyi ma dang zla ba ser por snang ba bskyed de /
T02D2516:27b-12: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o //
T02D2516:27b-13: de la re zhig sngar sngags bzlas pa'i srad bu
T02D2516:27b-14: dri zhim pa tha ma dkar po dang ldan pa
T02D2516:27b-15: / yid kyis badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba'i rdo
T02D2516:27b-16: rje'i tshig gis bzlas la rnam par snang mdzad du
T02D2516:27b-18: sgrub pa po'i grogs mchog badzra karma zhes brjod de
T02D2516:27b-19: rang gi snying gnas rdo rje las kyi gzugs su
T02D2516:27b-20: sprul bar bya'o // de nas badzra satva zhes brjod de /
T02D2516:27b-21: rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la srad bu
T02D2516:27b-22: de g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la
T02D2516:27b-23: / dza zhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo
T02D2516:27b-24: rje las kyi gzugs can gyi lag tu srad bu
T02D2516:27b-25: / de btang la / phyogs thams cad du mnyam pa nyid du bsgom zhing /
T02D2516:27b-27: rdo rje srad bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D2516:27b-28: yang slob dpon lhor 'dug la byang du bltas te /
T02D2516:27b-30: de nas me'i phyogs kyi char gnas pa la /
T02D2516:27b-31: byang du bltas te phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar du thig gdab po //
T02D2516:27b-32: rlung gi phyogs su gnas te /
T02D2516:27b-33: lho phyogs su bltas la nub kyi thig gdab po //
T02D2516:27b-34: de nyid du 'dug ste byang gi thig gdab po //
T02D2516:27b-35: yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste lho phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o ;
T02D2516:27b-36: / kha khyer gyi thig kyang gdab par bya'o //
T02D2516:27b-37: yang me'i mtshams su gnas te rlung gi mtshams kyi bar gyi thig gdab pa dang /
T02D2516:27b-38: yang bden bral gyi mtshams su gnas te dbang ldan
T02D2516:27b-39: gyi mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab par bya zhing
T02D2516:28a-1: grogs mchog bskor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2516:28a-2: de la re zhig srad bu'i sngags ni /
T02D2516:28a-3: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2516:28a-4: dza dza dza zhes bya ba gsum gyis sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis drang bar bya'o //
T02D2516:28a-5: de la sgo ni cha brgyad pa'o //
T02D2516:28a-6: sgo khyud ni sgo'i tshad kyi phyed do //
T02D2516:28a-7: kha khyer phyi'i thams cad dang nang gi kun ni sgo'i phyed do //
T02D2516:28a-8: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed kyi tshad du bya'o //
T02D2516:28a-9: rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur du bya'o //
T02D2516:28a-10: nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed
T02D2516:28a-11: la zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa kha khyer gyis
T02D2516:28a-13: ka ba brgyad dang ldan par thig btab la /
T02D2516:28a-14: seng ldeng gi phur bu 'og rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu la /
T02D2516:28a-15: steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbyibs can gyi phur bu la /
T02D2516:28a-16: rdo rje bur bu'i sngags bzlas la /
T02D2516:28a-17: rdo rje tho bas brdungs te snga ma bzhin du btab la /
T02D2516:28a-18: de la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ;
T02D2516:28a-19: phyi'i rdo rje'i phreng ba dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas
T02D2516:28a-20: brtsams te g-yas nas bskor ba'i rim gyis gdab par
T02D2516:28a-21: bya'o // dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyi nyis 'gyur la /
T02D2516:28a-22: mtha' skor khru drug par bya ba ni tshad chung ngu yin te /
T02D2516:28a-23: gzhan dag tu ni ji tsam 'tsham par bya'o //
T02D2516:28a-24: da ni lung las gsungs pa'i thig gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D2516:28a-25: sar pa las ni bkal nas kyang //
T02D2516:28a-26: tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa yi //
T02D2516:28a-27: thig gis mkhas pa ci nus kyis //
T02D2516:28a-28: dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab po //
T02D2516:28a-29: gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang //
T02D2516:28a-30: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //
T02D2516:28a-31: thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa //
T02D2516:28a-32: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2516:28a-33: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad du //
T02D2516:28a-34: sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su //
T02D2516:28a-35: rdo rje rin chen spras par ni //
T02D2516:28a-36: dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig gdab po //
T02D2516:28a-37: de li rim pa'i nang zhugs la //
T02D2516:28a-39: thig gis yongs su bskor bya zhing ;
T02D2516:28a-40: / ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis par //
T02D2516:28a-41: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la //
T02D2516:28a-42: shes rab can gyis thig gdab po //
T02D2516:28a-43: shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor //
T02D2516:28a-44: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
T02D2516:28a-45: nang dang phyi rol gyi kha khyer dang /
T02D2516:28a-46: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /
T02D2516:28b-0: @28b rnga yab dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang bri ba dang /
T02D2516:28b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi grva'i mtshams thams cad du /
T02D2516:28b-2: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs btags pa dang /
T02D2516:28b-3: de'i sgo rnams kyi ni khyud kyi mtshams rnams su /
T02D2516:28b-4: zla ba phyed pa la gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po ches mdzes par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2516:28b-5: gal te bgegs byung ba bzlog par 'dod na /
T02D2516:28b-6: phur bu'i sngags len 'bum bzlas pa'i phur bu dkyil
T02D2516:28b-7: 'khor gyi lte bar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te
T02D2516:28b-9: dbyibs 'dra ba'i phur bus bgegs thams cad la gdab par bya'o //
T02D2516:28b-10: de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la btags nas /
T02D2516:28b-11: shar nas bskor phyogs su zlum por bskor ba'i 'od
T02D2516:28b-12: kyi dkyil 'khor thig btab pa de'i phyi rol du
T02D2516:28b-14: de bzhin du zlum por thig btab la /
T02D2516:28b-15: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor der grog mkhar gyi sa la sogs pa las bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02D2516:28b-16: brgya byin gyi gzugs brnyan shar phyogs na gnas pa la /
T02D2516:28b-17: yi ge ai las brgya byin mdog ser po'o //
T02D2516:28b-18: me la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la yang de bzhin te /
T02D2516:28b-19: ram las me lha dmar po /
T02D2516:28b-20: aom ham las gshin rje mdog nag po /
T02D2516:28b-21: kam las srin po nag po //
T02D2516:28b-22: bam las chu lha dkar po /
T02D2516:28b-23: yam las rlung lha dud ka / phat las lus ngan po ser po /
T02D2516:28b-24: sumbha zhes bya ba las dbang ldan dkar po bskyed la /
T02D2516:28b-25: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug ta bcug
T02D2516:28b-26: la bcings te dbang du byas nas phur bus gdab
T02D2516:28b-27: po // shin tu yang yun ring du bgegs med par byed 'dod pas sas dgab par bya'o //
T02D2516:28b-28: de lta na yang gal te bgegs byed na /
T02D2516:28b-29: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas /
T02D2516:28b-30: lcags kyu la sogs pas kyang dgug pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2516:28b-31: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2516:28b-32: rkang pa g-yon pas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan mnan te /
T02D2516:28b-33: h'um bam h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pas spel ba'i tshul gyis /
T02D2516:28b-34: g-yon pa brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la /
T02D2516:28b-35: bgegs byed pa'i sprin la sogs pa la mngon par bltas te /
T02D2516:29a-1: rgya 'phangs te bstan la nam mkha'i khams thams cad
T02D2516:29a-2: du spros pas 'od zer 'bar ba kun du 'khrug
T02D2516:29a-3: pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis /
T02D2516:29a-4: rkang pa bteg cing bsnun pas /
T02D2516:29a-5: sprin la sogs pa thal bar byas par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2516:29a-6: de lta bus ni bcom phu nyid 'gyur ro //
T02D2516:29a-7: yang na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la /
T02D2516:29a-8: de'i 'og tu aa las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas /
T02D2516:29a-9: rgyud las bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur
T02D2516:29a-10: nges par byas la ham las 'phags pa mi g-yo
T02D2516:29a-11: ba yid kyis thugs ka nas phyung ste /
T02D2516:29a-12: badzra ham bandha zhes yid la brjod la /
T02D2516:29a-13: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du rlung gi phyogs su dri'i thig le bdun byas te /
T02D2516:29a-14: thig le re re zhing yang re re'i nang du chud par byas la /
T02D2516:29a-15: dbus ma dang tha ma yang thig le bdun dang ldan par byas te /
T02D2516:29a-16: thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun po ri dags la zhon pa mdog nag po /
T02D2516:29a-17: 'phags pa mi g-yo bas zhags pas bkug nas bcings par gyur par bsams la /
T02D2516:29a-18: de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la /
T02D2516:29a-19: lhag ma thig le drug po ni de bskor te kun nas gnas par bsam mo //
T02D2516:29a-20: de nas kham phor aa las ri rab tu bsams la /
T02D2516:29a-21: de'i steng du aa nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g-yogs pa /
T02D2516:29a-22: dbus su yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge
T02D2516:29a-23: h'um gi sa bon las byung ba mtshams rnams su
T02D2516:29a-24: mdung rtse gsum pa rnam par bsams la /
T02D2516:29a-25: de bzhin du badzra ham bandha zhes brjod de /
T02D2516:29a-26: kham phor des ji skad du bshad pa'i theg le bdun dgab par bya'o //
T02D2516:29a-27: de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du
T02D2516:29a-28: aom las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams
T02D2516:29a-29: te / 'phags pa mi g-yo ba dang /
T02D2516:29a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g-yon brkyang bas ri rab mnan nas /
T02D2516:29a-31: ral gri dang zhags pas rlung rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad par bsams te /
T02D2516:29a-32: de lta bus ni rlung rnams thams cad bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2516:29a-33: de la chu la sogs pa'i bgegs bzlog par bshad par bya ste /
T02D2516:29a-34: ham las rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D2516:29b-0: 'phags pa mi g-yo bar bdag nyed @29b bskyad la
T02D2516:29b-2: ba glang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas /
T02D2516:29b-4: ram las me'i snying po bskyed la /
T02D2516:29b-7: lag pa g-yon pas bzung la /
T02D2516:29b-8: lag pa g-yas pas lcags kyu dang zhags pas drangs nas /
T02D2516:29b-9: bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste /
T02D2516:29b-10: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas la /
T02D2516:29b-11: rkang pa g-yon pas spyi bo nas btsir la /
T02D2516:29b-13: na ma: sa mantra badzr'a n'am /
T02D2516:29b-14: tsanda mah'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um /
T02D2516:29b-15: tra ka ham mam zhes brjod nas gzugs brnyan de ral gris gtub par bya'o //
T02D2516:29b-16: dug dang ske tshe dang lan tshva la sogs pas gzugs brnyan bskus la me sa gdung bar bya'o //
T02D2516:29b-17: me yis gdungs pas de nyid kyang //
T02D2516:29b-18: gdungs par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02D2516:29b-19: tshangs pa'am brgya byin yin na yang /
T02D2516:29b-20: de yi mod la myur du 'tshig / ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so //
T02D2516:29b-21: las 'di dag kyang 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal
T02D2516:29b-22: 'byor gyis de'i gsang sngags khri bzlas pa'i sngon du
T02D2516:29b-23: bsnyen pa byas nas de'i 'og tu las bya'o //
T02D2516:29b-24: yang aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba 'dis 'phags pa
T02D2516:29b-25: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal
T02D2516:29b-28: phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa /
T02D2516:29b-29: phyag g-yon gnyis na zhags pa gtun shing bsnams pa /
T02D2516:29b-31: khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams kun du gang bar mdzad pa rnam par bsams la /
T02D2516:29b-32: mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2516:29b-33: sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsam pas /
T02D2516:29b-34: tsham ngam dang bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2516:29b-35: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02D2516:29b-36: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni mdun thung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2516:29b-37: de ltar na yang gal te bgegs rnams zhi bar ma gyur na /
T02D2516:29b-38: kham phor som btang ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02D2516:30a-0: da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas sngags @30a * //
T02D2516:30a-2: yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02D2516:30a-5: me'i bgegs la sogs pa bsams la /
T02D2516:30a-6: sreg blugs brgya'am sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2516:30a-9: mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2516:30a-10: yang na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi spyor bas yi ge h'um bzlas brjod 'bum byas la //
T02D2516:30a-11: mi rus kyi rgyu las byas ba'i phur bu sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la /
T02D2516:30a-12: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02D2516:30a-13: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas /
T02D2516:30a-14: gzugs brnyan la phur bus gdab bo de nas me'i tshe ba zhi bar bshad par bya ste /
T02D2516:30a-15: me'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2516:30a-16: de'i steng du padma'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'khor lo /
T02D2516:30a-17: de'i steng du bam gnyis nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2516:30a-18: par snang mdzad dung dang kunda ltar dkar bar bzhugs
T02D2516:30a-19: te / mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las /
T02D2516:30a-20: chu bo bzhi 'bab pa lta bu'i char gyi rgyun
T02D2516:30a-21: babs pas phyogs bcur 'gengs par gyur par bsam par
T02D2516:30a-22: bya'o // rdo rje can dang rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kham phor gyi ri rab dang /
T02D2516:30a-23: phur bu yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02D2516:30a-25: rdo rje 'jigs byed can dag gis /
T02D2516:30a-26: de rnams kyi nam mkha' bcing bar byas la /
T02D2516:30a-27: rdo rje bcings pas dra ba bya'o //
T02D2516:30a-28: yang na mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gis bgegs bzlog par bya'o //
T02D2516:30a-29: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu h'um bzhis bton la /
T02D2516:30a-30: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la /
T02D2516:30a-32: de nas hi zhes bya bas mig g-yas pa dang /
T02D2516:30a-33: g-yon par nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02D2516:30a-34: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la /
T02D2516:30a-35: sgo rnams bya'o de nas tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2516:30a-36: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya
T02D2516:30a-37: ba 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsi thams
T02D2516:30a-38: cad la lan bdun gyi bar du mngon par bzlas
T02D2516:30a-39: na / rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2516:30a-40: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so
T02D2516:30a-41: na / // de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2516:30b-0: rdo rje'i @30b phyag rgya gnyis las ni //
T02D2516:30b-1: mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba //
T02D2516:30b-2: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
T02D2516:30b-3: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02D2516:30b-5: rdo rje nyi ma'i khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2516:30b-6: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2516:30b-7: aom badzra tsitra sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2516:30b-8: g-yas nas bskor bas g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon rtsi dgye bar bya ste /
T02D2516:30b-10: de'i mi pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2516:30b-11: sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang
T02D2516:30b-12: gu dang dkar ba'i rim pa 'dis ci bder dgye'o
T02D2516:30b-13: // khru drug par bya ba ni tshon rtsi'i ri mo chung tshad yin te /
T02D2516:30b-14: de phan chad khru bskyed pas rkang pa yang bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2516:30b-15: de yang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las /
T02D2516:30b-16: sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
T02D2516:30b-17: gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste //
T02D2516:30b-18: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin gzhan //
T02D2516:30b-20: dkar po nang du shes bya ste //
T02D2516:30b-21: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02D2516:30b-22: ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2516:30b-23: shar phyogs su ni sngon po che //
T02D2516:30b-24: lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa //
T02D2516:30b-25: nub kyi phyogs ni dmar po ste //
T02D2516:30b-26: byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan //
T02D2516:30b-27: dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni //
T02D2516:30b-28: shel ltar snang ba bla na med //
T02D2516:30b-29: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
T02D2516:30b-30: rab mnyam gzhag ste de yis bri //
T02D2516:30b-31: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su //
T02D2516:30b-32: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la //
T02D2516:30b-33: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D2516:30b-34: sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing //
T02D2516:30b-35: sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi ;
T02D2516:30b-36: / dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus rnams su //
T02D2516:30b-37: rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog //
T02D2516:30b-38: bzhi po legs par gzhag par bya //
T02D2516:30b-39: dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu //
T02D2516:30b-40: rdo rje gom pas song nas ni //
T02D2516:30b-41: mi g-yo ba la sogs pa yi //
T02D2516:30b-42: sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag / mi g-yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2516:30b-43: rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag / rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2516:30b-44: rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag / tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2516:30b-45: rdo rje spyan sogs rdzogs par bzhag / gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2516:31a-1: rgya gram la sogs gzhag /'khor lo yi ni grva rnams su //
T02D2516:31a-2: rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag / dkyil 'khor phyi rol grva rnams su //
T02D2516:31a-3: sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag / sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni //
T02D2516:31a-4: sgo srung bzhi yang gzhag par bya //
T02D2516:31a-5: dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni //
T02D2516:31a-6: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag / de la
T02D2516:31a-7: rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin te
T02D2516:31a-8: / aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um /
T02D2516:31a-9: de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2516:31a-10: yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni //
T02D2516:31a-11: rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung //
T02D2516:31a-12: phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang rung /
T02D2516:31a-13: dam tshig nyams pa de mi 'gyur //
T02D2516:31a-14: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par rdo rje snang mdzad ni /
T02D2516:31a-15: sku mdog dkar po seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2516:31a-16: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa /
T02D2516:31a-17: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od mnga' ba /
T02D2516:31a-20: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D2516:31a-21: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02D2516:31a-22: zhal bzhi pa zhal dang po shar du gtsigs pa'o //
T02D2516:31a-23: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs yang de bzhin te /
T02D2516:31a-24: sku mdog kyang sngon po dang /
T02D2516:31a-28: glang po che la sogs pa'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2516:31a-29: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02D2516:31a-30: rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02D2516:31a-32: sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2516:31a-33: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od mnga' ba /
T02D2516:31a-34: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D2516:31a-35: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02D2516:31a-36: zhal gcig pa rnam par snang mdzad la mngon sum
T02D2516:31a-37: du phyogs pa rnams rang rang gi phyag rgya chen
T02D2516:31a-38: po dang badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba de bzhin
T02D2516:31a-39: gshegs pa lnga'i snying po zlos shing bzhugs su gsol
T02D2516:31a-40: la / bris pa ltar bar snang la mngon du
T02D2516:31a-41: bzhugs pa rnams kyang de bzhin du phab ste gcig
T02D2516:31a-42: la / tu bya'o // de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar /
T02D2516:31a-43: satva badzra zhes bya bas rdo rje sems ma sku mdog sngon mo /
T02D2516:31a-44: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po bkod la /
T02D2516:31a-45: badzra a'a be sha aa zhes bya bas dbab par bya'o //
T02D2516:31b-0: @31b g-yas su ratna badzri zhes bya bas rin chen sems ma sku mdog ser mo /
T02D2516:31b-1: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'o //
T02D2516:31b-2: rgyab tu dharma badzri zhes bya bas rdo rje chos ma sku mdog dmar mo /
T02D2516:31b-3: padma dkar dmar 'dab ma bcu drug pa la 'dab ma brgyad thur du gyes pa /
T02D2516:31b-4: 'dab ma brgyad gyen du bltas pa /
T02D2516:31b-5: kha ma bye ba'i nang na rdo rje rtse lnga pa chud pa'o //
T02D2516:31b-6: g-yon du karma badzri zhes bya bas /
T02D2516:31b-7: rdo rje las ma sku mdog ljang gu / sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa /
T02D2516:31b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar ni /
T02D2516:31b-10: phyag rgya chen pos rang rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa /
T02D2516:31b-11: rab tu dgyes pas spyan gdangs pa /
T02D2516:31b-12: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2516:31b-13: rnam par snang mdzad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin la /
T02D2516:31b-14: 'di dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs
T02D2516:31b-15: pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D2516:31b-16: / rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs par bya'o //
T02D2516:31b-17: mi bskyod pa'i mdun du ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2516:31b-18: g-yas su ni rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D2516:31b-19: g-yon du ni rdo rje chags pa'o //
T02D2516:31b-20: rgyab tu ni rdo rje legs pa'o //
T02D2516:31b-21: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi mdun du ni rdo rje
T02D2516:31b-22: rin chen la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes
T02D2516:31b-23: par bya'o // lhag ma ni shes pa kho nar zad do //
T02D2516:31b-24: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la byams pa la sogs pa /
T02D2516:31b-25: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhis stong du ma tshang ba /
T02D2516:31b-26: shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs su cha mnyam po go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2516:31b-27: de la shar phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2516:31b-28: lho phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsnams pa'o //
T02D2516:31b-29: nub phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2516:31b-30: byang phyogs pa rnams ni sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2516:31b-31: de nas 'di rnams kyi dgod pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D2516:31b-33: aom sarba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha dharma te
T02D2516:31b-34: ga gnas mudga te ma h'a na ya pa ri
T02D2516:31b-36: zhes bya ba 'di ni rig pa'o //

T02D2516:32a-61: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
T02D2516:32a-65: yon tan lag / spos kyi glang po /

T02D2516:49b-18: lan bdun bskor ba byas la /
T02D2516:49b-19: snga ma bzhin du gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2516:49b-20: aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor phyags la /
T02D2516:49b-21: dman ma la sogs pa chu por dor bar bya'o //
T02D2516:49b-22: de nas h'um ba zhis phur bu thams cad bton la /
T02D2516:49b-23: aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2516:49b-24: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur bu
T02D2516:49b-25: dang gzugs brnyan thams cad bkrus la bu gu yang
T02D2516:49b-26: dgang bar bya'o // de nas 'jug pa'i sgo la
T02D2516:49b-27: mngon par phyogs pa'i las thams cad pa'i thab khung
T02D2516:49b-28: dgang bar bya'o // byas la / bdag dang slob ma dang /
T02D2516:49b-29: sa bdag dang sems can thams cad la dmigs te /
T02D2516:49b-31: de nas slob ma'i gtso bo g-yon logs su bzhag ste /
T02D2516:49b-32: rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags kyis mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02D2516:49b-33: de nas sangs rgyas spyan gyis brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02D2516:49b-34: de nas phyag rgya de nyid bcings la mar dang
T02D2516:49b-35: zho dang 'dres pa'i til gyis sbyin sreg brgya bya'o
T02D2516:49b-36: // de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i chus
T02D2516:49b-37: spyi bor gtor nas de nyid bzlas pa'i srung skud
T02D2516:49b-38: mkhrig ma g-yon par bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2516:50a-1: khar lag pas gtugs te spyan gyi sngags lan brgya bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2516:50a-2: gzhan dag la ni ji skad du bshad pa'i sbyin sreg lan bdun bdun bya'o //
T02D2516:50a-3: de nas bsang gtor dang srung skud bcing ba dang snying gar gtugs pa dag kyang bya'o //
T02D2516:50a-4: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog ;
T02D2516:50a-5: / dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa //
T02D2516:50a-6: rdo rje thams cad 'byung byas las //
T02D2516:50a-7: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02D2516:50a-8: des ni 'jig rten ma lus pa //
T02D2516:50a-9: kun dga' snying po rig pa mchog / sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig po //
T02D2516:50a-10: gtso chen rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig /
T02D2516:50a-11: dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa /
T02D2516:50a-12: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud chen
T02D2516:50a-13: po las btus thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba
T02D2516:50a-14: / rdo rje slob dpon chen po kun thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2516:50a-15: rdo rje slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2516:50a-17: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'arya buddha shr'i sh'anti dang /
